h1_title: How to Find All Purple Talisman Altars in Chapter 4
h2_title: How to Find the Purple Talismans in the Webbed Hollow
content: As you approach, a cutscene will begin. You'll be able to take the Talisman from the altar straight after.
promot:

The content is as follows:
As you approach, a cutscene will begin. You'll be able to take the Talisman from the altar straight after.
